title: Glitch with skins? idk!!!
body: So i went on today to see if there was an update for patch 7.10 and there was, so i updated it and i went on cait to see if there were any new skins for her as i am waiting for pulsefire cait with my RP. I see the splash art but im not able to click/buy it!!! idk why and i really want this skin, please help im so confused T.T xoxo-Bagel{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: Pulsefire Caitlyn hasn't been released quite yet, but she should be hitting the shop soon! Make sure to check the [**sales page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) for updates!
oh i c, is it like on the legacy client when the splash art showed  but it said unavailable? but could i get a hint of when it will be hitting the shop? ;D just a very mild hint. ;3
